ml_tags: In Loving Memory of our Beloved Nokubonga Iris Nxasana Born: 20 March 1966 + 20 November 2022 Sister and Forever Our Mamkhulu. Lala kahle maZondo, you will forever be in our hearts and memories. Wife, Mother, Grandmother, Intonga: Hymn 36 uMama womthandazo If we live, we live for the Lord; and if we die, we die for the Lord. So, whether we live or die, we belong to the Lord. - Romans 14:8
